name: DouchéART
description:
Become the greatest contemporary artist of your generation!

Craft the ultimate masterpiece using objects you find scattered around the gallery and experience for yourself what it feels like to make a sculpture out of trash and feel the delight of a snobbish audience as they admire your creation. But be careful, you can use each object only once!

And if someone tells you it's not art, worry not, they cannot understand it!

This game can be played using both controllers and hand tracking on Oculus Quest. 

EDIT:

PC build was uploaded subsequently. Please note that in PC version hand tracking doesn't work.

Asset used:

  1. OctoXR

Models used:

  1. Stone Head Low Poly
  2. Polygonal Venus Statue
  3. Griffin Statue
  4. Head Sculpture
  5. POLYGON Prototype

Music

  1.  Fantasy Sound Bundle
